ARABIC: بَلَىٰٓ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But in fact his Lord was always watching him!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Why not? His Lord was always watching him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But no; (how would he not revert)? His Lord was ever watching him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is a fact. Their Lord is Well-Aware of (all that they do).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Surely yes, why not? Indeed his Lord is seeing him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Yes! Verily, his Lord has been ever beholding him!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Yea! surely his Lord does ever see him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Yes indeed; his Lord had sight of him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, but lo! his Lord is ever looking on him!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But he will indeed! His Lord was ever watching him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Yea! his Lord had ever been beholding him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Yes, his Lord had been watching him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nay, nay! for his Lord was (ever) watchful of him!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Yes! Verily, his Lord has been ever beholding him!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Yes indeed, his Lord was ever watching him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In fact, his Lord was watching him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever of him, Seeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [84:15] Nay!, he will return to Him; indeed his Lord is ever Seer of him, knowing that he would return to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nay, but lo! his Lord) when He created him (is ever looking on him!) knew that He will raise him again after death
